00037 /*! The algorith name. */
00038 #define MAS5_ALG_NAME "ExpressionStat"
00039 
00040 /*! The algorithm version. */
00041 #define MAS5_ALG_VERSION "5.0"
00042 
00043 /*! The prog ID of the GCOS component that implemented the MAS5 algorithm. */
00044 #define MAS5_PROG_ID "GeneChip.CallGEBaseCall.1"
00045 
00046 /*! The program name. */
00047 #define PROGRAM_NAME_VALUE L"MAS5"
00048 
00049 /*! The company name. */
00050 #define PROGRAM_COMPANY_VALUE L"Affymetrix"
00051 
00052 /*! The ID of the program. */
00053 #define PROGRAM_ID_VALUE L"5.0"

00055 /*
00056  * Convert to a string.
00057  */
00058 string ToString(int value)
00059 {
00060         ostringstream str;
00061         str << value;
00062         return str.str();
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * Convert to a string.
00067  */
00068 string ToString(float value)
00069 {
00070     char buf[64];
00071     sprintf(buf, "%0.6f", value);
00072         return buf;
00073 }

00080     programName = name;
00081     programCompany = co;
00082     programId = id;

00085 /*
00086  * Add the parameter to the alg parameters section.
00087  */
00088 void MAS5CHPUtils::AddAlgParam(const std::wstring &name, const std::wstring &value)
00089 {
00090         if (cc_data != NULL)
00091                 cc_data->AddAlgParam(name, value);
00092 
00093         else if (gcos_data != NULL)
00094                 gcos_data->AddAlgorithmParameter(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(name).c_str(), StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str());
00095 }
00096

00122  * Clear the members.
00123  */
00124 void MAS5CHPUtils::Clear()
00125 {
00126         cc_data = NULL;
00127         gcos_data = NULL;
00128         mas5_data = NULL;
00129         report_data = NULL;
00130     programName.clear();
00131     programCompany.clear();
00132     programId.clear();

00135 /*
00136  * Store the algorithm parameters to the chp object.
00137  */
00138 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreAlgParams()
00139 {
00140         CExpStatAlgSettings &params = mas5_data->GetParameters();
00141 
00142         AddAlgParam(L"HZ", params.NumberHorZones);
00143         AddAlgParam(L"VZ", params.NumberVertZones);
00144         AddAlgParam(L"BG", (int) params.IntensityLowPercent);
00145         AddAlgParam(L"Alpha1", params.Alpha1);
00146         AddAlgParam(L"Alpha2", params.Alpha2);
00147         AddAlgParam(L"Tau", params.Tau);
00148 
00149         if (params.SFMethod != CExpStatAlgSettings::DEFINED_SCALING_FACTOR)
00150         {
00151                 AddAlgParam(L"TGT", (int) params.TGT);
00152         }
00153 
00154         AddAlgParam(L"SF", params.ScaleFactor);
00155 
00156         AddAlgParam(L"NF", params.NormFactor);
00157 
00158         if (params.ProbeMaskFile.length() > 0)
00159                 AddAlgParam(L"ProbeMask", StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(params.ProbeMaskFile));
00160 
00161         if (params.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS)
00162                 AddAlgParam(L"ScaleMask", L"All");
00163         else if (params.SFMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::SCALE_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS)
00164                 AddAlgParam(L"ScaleMask", StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(params.ScaleMaskFile));
00165 
00166         if (mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(0) != NULL)
00167         {
00168                 AddAlgParam(L"Gamma1L", params.Gamma1L);
00169                 AddAlgParam(L"Gamma1H", params.Gamma1H);
00170                 AddAlgParam(L"Gamma2L", params.Gamma2L);
00171                 AddAlgParam(L"Gamma2H", params.Gamma2H);
00172                 AddAlgParam(L"Perturbation", params.Perturbation);
00173 
00174                 if (params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_ALL_PROBE_SETS)
00175                         AddAlgParam(L"NormMask", L"All");
00176                 else if (params.NormMethod == CExpStatAlgSettings::NORM_TO_SELECTED_PROBE_SETS)
00177                         AddAlgParam(L"NormMask", StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(params.NormMaskFile));
00178 
00179                 AddAlgParam(L"BaselineSF", params.BaseScaleFactor);
00180                 AddAlgParam(L"BF", StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(mas5_data->GetBaselineCellData().GetFileName()));
00181         }
00182 }

00220 /*
00221  * Store the summary parameters to the chp object.
00222  */
00223 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreSummaryParams(bool separateEntries)
00224 {
00225         wchar_t buf[256];
00226         AddChipSum(L"RawQ", mas5_data->GetRawQ());
00227 
00228         AvgStdvMinMaxType &bg = mas5_data->GetBgStats();
00229     if (separateEntries == false)
00230     {
00231             swprintf(buf, 256, L"Avg:%0.2f,Std:%0.2f,Min:%0.1f,Max:%0.1f", bg.avg, bg.stdv, bg.min, bg.max);
00232             AddChipSum(L"Background", buf);
00233     }
00234     else
00235     {
00236             AddChipSum(L"BG Avg", bg.avg);
00237             AddChipSum(L"BG Std", bg.stdv);
00238             AddChipSum(L"BG Min", bg.min);
00239             AddChipSum(L"BG Max", bg.max);
00240     }
00241 
00242         AvgStdvMinMaxType &ns = mas5_data->GetNoiseStats();
00243     if (separateEntries == false)
00244     {
00245             swprintf(buf, 256, L"Avg:%0.2f,Std:%0.2f,Min:%0.1f,Max:%0.1f", ns.avg, ns.stdv, ns.min, ns.max);
00246             AddChipSum(L"Noise", buf);
00247     }
00248     else
00249     {
00250             AddChipSum(L"Noise Avg", ns.avg);
00251             AddChipSum(L"Noise Std", ns.stdv);
00252             AddChipSum(L"Noise Min", ns.min);
00253             AddChipSum(L"Noise Max", ns.max);
00254     }
00255 
00256         ControlInformationList &cntrls = mas5_data->GetControlInfo();
00257         for (ControlInformationList::iterator it=cntrls.begin(); it!=cntrls.end(); ++it)
00258         {
00259                 ControlInformationType &cntrl = *it;
00260         if (separateEntries == false)
00261         {
00262                     swprintf(buf, 256, L"Avg:%0.0f,Count:%d", cntrl.avg, cntrl.count);
00263                     if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CheckerboardPositiveQCProbeSetType)
00264                             AddChipSum(L"Corner+", buf);
00265                     else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CheckerboardNegativeQCProbeSetType)
00266                             AddChipSum(L"Corner-", buf);
00267                     else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CentralCrossPositiveQCProbeSetType)
00268                             AddChipSum(L"Central+", buf);
00269                     else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CentralCrossNegativeQCProbeSetType)
00270                             AddChipSum(L"Central-", buf);
00271         }
00272         else
00273         {
00274                     if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CheckerboardPositiveQCProbeSetType)
00275             {
00276                             AddChipSum(L"Corner+ Avg", (int) (cntrl.avg+0.5f));
00277                             AddChipSum(L"Corner+ Count", cntrl.count);
00278             }
00279             else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CheckerboardNegativeQCProbeSetType)
00280             {
00281                             AddChipSum(L"Corner- Avg", (int) (cntrl.avg+0.5f));
00282                             AddChipSum(L"Corner- Count", cntrl.count);
00283             }
00284                     else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CentralCrossPositiveQCProbeSetType)
00285             {
00286                             AddChipSum(L"Central+ Avg", (int) (cntrl.avg+0.5f));
00287                             AddChipSum(L"Central+ Count", cntrl.count);
00288             }
00289                     else if (cntrl.qcType == affxcdf::CentralCrossNegativeQCProbeSetType)
00290             {
00291                             AddChipSum(L"Central- Avg", (int) (cntrl.avg+0.5f));
00292                             AddChipSum(L"Central- Count", cntrl.count);
00293             }
00294         }
00295         }
00296 
00297         if (mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(0) != NULL)
00298         {
00299                 AddAlgParam(L"BaselineRawQ", mas5_data->GetBaselineRawQ());
00300         }
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*
00304  * Store the detection statistics.
00305  */
00306 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReportDetectionStats()
00307 {
00308     double dval;
00309         int total = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().NumSets();
00310 
00311         int pcount = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().PresentCalls().Count();
00312         double psignal = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().PresentCalls().Signal();
00313         AddChipSum(L"#P", pcount);
00314     dval = (total > 0 ? 100.0*pcount/total : 0);
00315         AddChipSum(L"%P", (float)dval);
00316     dval = (pcount > 0 ? psignal/pcount : 0);
00317     AddChipSum(L"Signal(P)", (float)dval);
00318 
00319         int mcount = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().MarginalCalls().Count();
00320         double msignal = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().MarginalCalls().Signal();
00321         AddChipSum(L"#M", mcount);
00322     dval = (total > 0 ? 100.0*mcount/total : 0);
00323         AddChipSum(L"%M", (float)dval);
00324     dval = (mcount > 0 ? msignal/mcount : 0);
00325         AddChipSum(L"Signal(M)", (float)dval);
00326 
00327         int acount = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().AbsentCalls().Count();
00328         double asignal = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().AbsentCalls().Signal();
00329         AddChipSum(L"#A", acount);
00330     dval = (total > 0 ? 100.0*acount/total : 0);
00331         AddChipSum(L"%A", (float)dval);
00332     dval = (acount > 0 ? asignal/acount : 0);
00333         AddChipSum(L"Signal(A)", (float)dval);
00334 
00335     dval = (total > 0 ? (psignal+msignal+asignal)/total : 0);
00336         AddChipSum(L"Signal(All)", (float)dval);
00337 }
00338 
00339 /*
00340  * Store the report parameters.
00341  */
00342 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReportParameters()
00343 {
00344         int total = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().NumSets();
00345         AddChipSum(L"#Probe Sets Exceeding Probe Pair Threshold", total);
00346         AddChipSum(L"Probe Pair Threshold", report_data->Results().ProbePairThreshold());
00347         if (report_data->Results().AntiSenseControls() == true)
00348                 AddChipSum(L"Control Direction", L"Antisense");
00349         else
00350                 AddChipSum(L"Control Direction", L"Sense");
00351 }
00352 
00353 /*
00354  * Store a control statistic.
00355  */
00356 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReportControlStat(const wchar_t *controlType,
00357                                           const ExpressionControlResult &result)
00358 {
00359         if (result.HasControlResult(ExpressionControl::THREE_PRIME_PROBE_SET) == false &&
00360                 result.HasControlResult(ExpressionControl::THREE_PRIME_PROBE_SET) == false &&
00361                 result.HasControlResult(ExpressionControl::THREE_PRIME_PROBE_SET) == false)
00362                 return;
00363 
00364         // Store the 3/5/M values.
00365         const wchar_t *Detection[4] = {L"P", L"M", L"A", L"No Call"};
00366         const wchar_t *ControlValueString[3] = {L"3", L"M", L"5"};
00367         wchar_t name[256];
00368         wchar_t value[256];
00369         for (int i=0; i<NUM_SETS_PER_CONTROL; i++)
00370         {
00371                 if (result.HasControlResult((ExpressionControl::ControlValueType)i) == true)
00372                 {
00373                         swprintf(name, sizeof(name), 
00374                L"%s_%s_%s_signal", controlType,
00375                StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(result.GetName()).c_str(), ControlValueString[i]);
00376                         AddChipSum(name, result.GetControlSignalResult((ExpressionControl::ControlValueType)i));
00377 
00378                         swprintf(name, sizeof(name),
00379                L"%s_%s_%s_detection", controlType,
00380                StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(result.GetName()).c_str(), ControlValueString[i]);
00381                         swprintf(value, sizeof(value),
00382                L"%s", Detection[result.GetControlDetectionResult((ExpressionControl::ControlValueType)i)]);
00383                         AddChipSum(name, value);
00384                 }
00385         }
00386 
00387         // Store the average value.
00388         float avg = 0.0f;
00389         int iTotal = 0;
00390         for (int i=0; i<NUM_SETS_PER_CONTROL; i++)
00391         {
00392                 if (result.HasControlResult((ExpressionControl::ControlValueType)i) == true)
00393                 {
00394                         avg += result.GetControlSignalResult((ExpressionControl::ControlValueType)i);
00395                         ++iTotal;
00396                 }
00397         }
00398         if (iTotal == 0)
00399                 avg = 0.0f;
00400         else
00401                 avg /= iTotal;
00402 
00403         swprintf(name, 256, L"%s_%s_avg-signal", controlType, StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(result.GetName()).c_str());
00404         AddChipSum(name, avg);
00405 
00406         // Store the 3/5 ratio.
00407         float ratio = result.GetThreeFiveRatio();
00408         if (ratio >= 0)
00409         {
00410                 swprintf(name, 256, L"%s_%s_3-5-ratio", controlType, StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(result.GetName()).c_str());
00411                 AddChipSum(name, ratio);
00412         }
00413 }
00414 
00415 /*
00416  * Store the control statistics.
00417  */
00418 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReportControlStats()
00419 {
00420         ExpressionControlResultList::const_iterator it;
00421         for (it = report_data->Results().SpikeStats().begin(); it != report_data->Results().SpikeStats().end(); ++it)
00422         {
00423                 const ExpressionControlResult &result = *it;
00424                 StoreReportControlStat(L"Spike", result);
00425         }
00426         for (it = report_data->Results().HousekeepingStats().begin(); it != report_data->Results().HousekeepingStats().end(); ++it)
00427         {
00428                 const ExpressionControlResult &result = *it;
00429                 StoreReportControlStat(L"Housekeeping", result);
00430         }
00431 }
00432 
00433 /*
00434  * Store the change statistics.
00435  */
00436 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReportChangeStats()
00437 {
00438         if (report_data->DataAccessor()->HasComparisonData() == false)
00439                 return;
00440 
00441         int total = report_data->Results().ProbeSetResults().NumSets();
00442 
00443         AddChipSum(L"#I", report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().ChangeCount());
00444         if (total > 0)
00445         {
00446                 AddChipSum(L"%I", 100.0f*report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().ChangeCount()/total);
00447         }
00448 
00449         AddChipSum(L"#MI", report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().ModerateCount());
00450         if (total > 0)
00451         {
00452                 AddChipSum(L"%MI", 100.0f*report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().ModerateCount()/total);
00453         }
00454 
00455         AddChipSum(L"#D", report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().ChangeCount());
00456         if (total > 0)
00457         {
00458                 AddChipSum(L"%D", 100.0f*report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().ChangeCount()/total);
00459         }
00460 
00461         AddChipSum(L"#MD", report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().ModerateCount());
00462         if (total > 0)
00463         {
00464                 AddChipSum(L"%MD", 100.0f*report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().ModerateCount()/total);
00465         }
00466 
00467         AddChipSum(L"#NC", report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().ChangeCount());
00468         if (total > 0)
00469         {
00470                 AddChipSum(L"%NC", 100.0f*report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().ChangeCount()/total);
00471         }
00472 
00473         AddChipSum(L"#(A/M->P, MI/I)", report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionChangeCount());
00474         if (total > 0)
00475         {
00476                 AddChipSum(L"%(A/M->P, MI/I)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionChangeCount()/total);
00477         }
00478 
00479         AddChipSum(L"#(P->A/M, MD/D)",  report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionChangeCount());
00480         if (total > 0)
00481         {
00482                 AddChipSum(L"%(P->A/M, MD/D)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionChangeCount()/total);
00483         }
00484 
00485         AddChipSum(L"#(P->P, MI/I)", report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionPresentCount());
00486         if (total > 0)
00487         {
00488                 AddChipSum(L"%(P->P, MI/I)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionPresentCount()/total);
00489         }
00490 
00491         AddChipSum(L"#(P->P, MD/D)", report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionPresentCount());
00492         if (total > 0)
00493         {
00494                 AddChipSum(L"%(P->P, MD/D)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionPresentCount()/total);
00495         }
00496 
00497         AddChipSum(L"#(A/M->A/M, MI/I)", report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionAbsentCount());
00498         if (total > 0)
00499         {
00500                 AddChipSum(L"%(A/M->A/M, MI/I)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().DetectionAbsentCount()/total);
00501         }
00502 
00503         AddChipSum(L"#(A/M->A/M, MD/D)", report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionAbsentCount());
00504         if (total > 0)
00505         {
00506                 AddChipSum(L"%(A/M->A/M, MD/D)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().DetectionAbsentCount()/total);
00507         }
00508 
00509         AddChipSum(L"#(P->P, NC)", report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().DetectionPresentCount());
00510         if (total > 0)
00511         {
00512                 AddChipSum(L"%(P->P, NC)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().DetectionPresentCount()/total);
00513         }
00514 
00515         AddChipSum(L"#(A/M->A/M, NC)", report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().DetectionAbsentCount());
00516         if (total > 0)
00517         {
00518                 AddChipSum(L"%(A/M->A/M, NC)", 100.0f*report_data->Results().NoChangeStats().DetectionAbsentCount()/total);
00519         }
00520 
00521         wchar_t buf2[256];
00522         float lower;
00523         float upper;
00524         ChangeStats::GetBinRange(0, lower, upper);
00525         swprintf(buf2, 256, L"#I(%0.0f<=SLR<%0.0f)", lower, upper);
00526         AddChipSum(buf2, report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().FoldChangeCount(0));
00527         for (int i=1; i<NUMBER_FOLD_CHANGE_BINS; i++)
00528         {
00529                 ChangeStats::GetBinRange(i, lower, upper);
00530                 swprintf(buf2, 256, L"#I(SLR>=%0.0f)", lower);
00531                 AddChipSum(buf2, report_data->Results().IncreaseStats().FoldChangeCount(i));
00532         }
00533 
00534         ChangeStats::GetBinRange(0, lower, upper);
00535         swprintf(buf2, 256, L"#D(%0.0f<=SLR<%0.0f)", lower, upper);
00536         AddChipSum(buf2, report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().FoldChangeCount(0));
00537         for (int i=1; i<NUMBER_FOLD_CHANGE_BINS; i++)
00538         {
00539                 ChangeStats::GetBinRange(i, lower, upper);
00540                 swprintf(buf2, 256, L"#D(SLR>=%0.0f)", lower);
00541                 AddChipSum(buf2, report_data->Results().DecreaseStats().FoldChangeCount(i));
00542         }
00543 }
00544 
00545 /*
00546  * Store the report results to the chp object.
00547  */
00548 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreReport()
00549 {
00550         if (report_data == NULL)
00551                 return;
00552 
00553         StoreReportParameters();
00554         StoreReportDetectionStats();
00555         StoreReportControlStats();
00556         StoreReportChangeStats();
00557 }
00558 
00559 /*
00560  * Save the results to the CHP file.
00561  */
00562 bool MAS5CHPUtils::SaveCHPFile(const std::string &chpFile, CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation &exp, ExpressionProbeSetReporter &report, bool reportPass, bool saveToLegacyFile)
00563 {
00564         mas5_data = &exp;
00565         if (reportPass == true)
00566                 report_data = &report;
00567         else
00568                 report_data = NULL;
00569 
00570         // Save the results to the CHP file.
00571         if (saveToLegacyFile == true)
00572                 return SaveGCOSCHPFile(chpFile);
00573         else
00574                 return SaveCommandConsoleCHPFile(chpFile);
00575 }
00576 
00577 /*
00578  * Save the results to a GCOS CHP file.
00579  */
00580 bool MAS5CHPUtils::SaveGCOSCHPFile(const std::string &chpFile)
00581 {
00582         try
00583         {
00584                 affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter writer;
00585                 gcos_data = &writer;
00586                 writer.SetFileName(chpFile.c_str());
00587                 writer.SetAlgorithmName(MAS5_ALG_NAME);
00588                 writer.SetAlgorithmVersion(MAS5_ALG_VERSION);
00589                 writer.SetParentCelFileName(mas5_data->GetCellData().GetFileName().c_str());
00590                 writer.SetProgID(MAS5_PROG_ID);
00591                 int nsets=mas5_data->GetNumResults();
00592                 writer.InitializeForWriting(mas5_data->GetRows(), mas5_data->GetCols(),
00593                         nsets, mas5_data->GetChipType().c_str(),
00594                         affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType);
00595 
00596                 // Save the algorithm parameters and the chip summary parameters
00597                 StoreAlgParams();
00598                 StoreSummaryParams(false);
00599                 StoreReport();
00600 
00601                 // Write the background info.
00602                 AllZonesInfoType zoneInfo = mas5_data->GetBackgroundZoneInfo();
00603                 writer.AddBackgroundInfo(zoneInfo.number_zones, zoneInfo.smooth_factor);
00604                 for (int i=0; i<zoneInfo.number_zones; i++)
00605                 {
00606                         ZoneInfo &z = zoneInfo.pZones[i];
00607                         writer.AddBackgroundZone((int)z.center.x, (int)z.center.y, z.background);
00608                 }
00609 
00610                 // Write the results.
00611                 bool hasCompData = (mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(0) != NULL);
00612                 for (int i=0; i<nsets; i++)
00613                 {
00614                         AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = mas5_data->GetAbsStatResult(i);
00615                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->Signal = result->Signal;
00616                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->Detection = result->Detection;
00617                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->DetectionPValue = result->DetectionPValue;
00618                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->NumPairs = result->NumPairs;
00619                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->NumUsedPairs = result->NumUsedPairs;
00620                         writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->m_HasCompResults = hasCompData;
00621 
00622                         if (hasCompData == true)
00623                         {
00624                                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *cresult = mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(i);
00625                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->Change = cresult->Change;
00626                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->ChangePValue = cresult->ChangePValue;
00627                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->SignalLogRatio = cresult->SignalLogRatio;
00628                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->SignalLogRatioLow = cresult->SignalLogRatioLow;
00629                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->SignalLogRatioHigh = cresult->SignalLogRatioHigh;
00630                                 writer.GetExpressionResults(i)->NumCommonPairs = cresult->NumCommonPairs;
00631                         }
00632                 }
00633 
00634                 // Create the new file.
00635                 if (writer.CreateNewFile() == false)
00636                         return false;
00637 
00638                 // Save the results.
00639                 if (writer.Save() == false)
00640                         return false;
00641 
00642                 return true;
00643         }
00644         catch (...)
00645         {
00646                 return false;
00647         }
00648 }
00649 
00650 /*
00651  * Store the headers of the cel and baseline to the CHP file.
00652  */
00653 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreParentHeaders()
00654 {
00655         GenericData *gdata = mas5_data->GetCellData().GetGenericData();
00656         if (gdata != NULL)
00657                 cc_data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00658 
00659         bool hasCompData = (mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(0) != NULL);
00660         if (hasCompData == true)
00661         {
00662                 gdata = mas5_data->GetBaselineCellData().GetGenericData();
00663                 if (gdata != NULL)
00664                         cc_data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00665         }
00666 }
00667 
00668 /*
00669  * Save the program information to the AGCC file.
00670  */
00671 void MAS5CHPUtils::StoreProgramInfo()
00672 {
00673         ParameterNameValueType p;
00674         p.SetName(PROGRAM_NAME);
00675         p.SetValueText(programName);
00676         cc_data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(p);
00677         p.SetName(PROGRAM_ID);
00678         p.SetValueText(programId);
00679         cc_data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(p);
00680         p.SetName(PROGRAM_COMPANY);
00681         p.SetValueText(programCompany);
00682         cc_data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(p);
00683 }
00684 
00685 /*
00686  * Save the results to a Command Console CHP file.
00687  */
00688 bool MAS5CHPUtils::SaveCommandConsoleCHPFile(const std::string &chpFile)
00689 {
00690         // Save the file
00691         try
00692         {
00693                 // Determine the max probe set name length
00694                 int maxln = 0;
00695                 int nsets=mas5_data->GetNumResults();
00696                 for (int i=0; i<nsets; i++)
00697                         maxln = max(maxln, (int) mas5_data->GetProbeSetName(i).size());
00698                 int nzones=mas5_data->GetBackgroundZoneInfo().number_zones;
00699                 CHPData data(chpFile, CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE);
00700                 cc_data = &data;
00701                 bool hasCompData = (mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(0) != NULL);
00702                 data.SetEntryCount(nsets, maxln, hasCompData);
00703                 data.SetBackgroundZoneCnt(nzones);
00704 
00705                 data.SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(MAS5_ALG_NAME));
00706                 data.SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(MAS5_ALG_VERSION));
00707                 data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(mas5_data->GetChipType()));
00708                 data.SetCols(mas5_data->GetCols());
00709                 data.SetRows(mas5_data->GetRows());
00710                 data.SetParentCell(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(mas5_data->GetCellData().GetFileName()));
00711                 data.SetProgId(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(MAS5_PROG_ID));
00712 
00713                 // Save the program info, algorithm parameters and the chip summary parameters
00714                 StoreProgramInfo();
00715                 StoreAlgParams();
00716                 StoreSummaryParams(true);
00717                 StoreReport();
00718                 StoreParentHeaders();
00719 
00720                 // Create a writer.
00721                 CHPFileWriter writer(data);
00722 
00723                 // Write the results.
00724                 writer.SeekToDataSet();
00725                 for (int i=0; i<nsets; i++)
00726                 {
00727                         AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = mas5_data->GetAbsStatResult(i);
00728                         if (hasCompData == false)
00729                         {
00730                                 CHPExpressionEntry e(
00731                                         mas5_data->GetProbeSetName(i),
00732                                         result->Detection, result->DetectionPValue, result->Signal,
00733                                         result->NumPairs, result->NumUsedPairs);
00734                                 writer.WriteExpressionEntry(e);
00735                         }
00736                         else
00737                         {
00738                                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *comp = mas5_data->GetCompStatResult(i);
00739                                 CHPExpressionEntry e(
00740                                         mas5_data->GetProbeSetName(i),
00741                                         result->Detection, result->DetectionPValue, result->Signal,
00742                                         result->NumPairs, result->NumUsedPairs,
00743                                         true,
00744                                         comp->Change,
00745                                         comp->ChangePValue,
00746                                         comp->SignalLogRatio,
00747                                         comp->SignalLogRatioLow,
00748                                         comp->SignalLogRatioHigh,
00749                                         comp->NumCommonPairs);
00750                                 writer.WriteExpressionEntry(e);
00751                         }
00752                 }
00753 
00754                 // Write the background info.
00755                 writer.SeekToBgSet();
00756                 AllZonesInfoType zoneInfo = mas5_data->GetBackgroundZoneInfo();
00757                 float sf = zoneInfo.smooth_factor;
00758                 for (int i=0; i<nzones; i++)
00759                 {
00760                         ZoneInfo &z = zoneInfo.pZones[i];
00761                         CHPBackgroundZone bgz(z.center.x,z.center.y, z.background,sf);
00762                         writer.WriteBackgroundZone(bgz);
00763                 }
00764                 return true;
00765         }
00766         catch(...)
00767         {
00768                 return false;
00769         }
00770 }
